page.title: 01General Information
page.content: The survey area for the Domesday Project covers 12 sqkms between Wethersfield and Sible Hedingham. It has 6 woods. There are 23 farms altogether. There is one main road which passes through our area, linking Sible Hedingham to Wethersfield. The ground is slightly undulating. The land is mainly farmland with no built up area, but there is a small industrial estate situated at the main road. The highest point in the area is 300 feet above sea level, whilst the lowest point within the survey area is 275 feet above sea level.
